A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi was the worst-written movie of the Star Wars movie franchise.  It broke Canon throughout\, was devoid of even basic logic\, and had absolutely no continuity with the Force Awakens. The attempts at humor were horrendous and showed that Rian Johnson had no clue as to appropriate tone.  The movie had galaxy-wide plot holes and even a moment of serious thought leads to head-shaking realizations as to how terribly written this movie was.
